examples:
Input:nums = [1,2,3,1], indexDiff = 3, valueDiff = 0Output:trueExplanation:We can choose (i, j) = (0, 3).
We satisfy the three conditions:
i != j --> 0 != 3
abs(i - j) <= indexDiff --> abs(0 - 3) <= 3
abs(nums[i] - nums[j]) <= valueDiff --> abs(1 - 1) <= 0
Input:nums = [1,5,9,1,5,9], indexDiff = 2, valueDiff = 3Output:falseExplanation:After trying all the possible pairs (i, j), we cannot satisfy the three conditions, so we return false.
data.problem_statement:
You are given an integer arraynumsand two integersindexDiffandvalueDiff.

Find a pair of indices(i, j)such that:

Returntrueif such pair exists orfalseotherwise.
data.title: Contains Duplicate III
